Looking forward to E3 2006
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2005 Topics (Year of the Mocchi Scream): Looking forward to E3 2006
By Lisa Shock on Friday, October 28, 2005 - 07:08 pm:

Just thought that I'd mention that I am making my E3 2006 plans right now. Last year's costs were about $350, this year with fuel costing more, it looks like the airfare is going to cost a bit more. I got some help last year, which was greatly appreciated, and could definitely use some help for the upcoming venture. -Even $5 would really help us out at this point. Sales from the ads on the left side of the site have been slow (I've taken in $3 this year so far!), and as always, I've got fixed monthly and annual costs associated with running the site (next month the $35 to run the chatroom will be due in addition to the monthly server bill).

Donations are accepted via Paypal (link on left side of page) or you can send a check or MO to the address in the Office of the Mayor (in the Privacy area, look in the Parental Consent Form). Anyway, this looks like a year when we'll finally have some MR programming at E3, so it would be great for me to be able to be there!

By RPGProgrammer on Friday, October 28, 2005 - 09:05 pm:
